```{r}
bas_results <-
    read_delim(
      "data/bas_results.txt", 
      delim = "\t", escape_double = FALSE, 
      trim_ws = TRUE
      )
```


```{r}

  filter(Baumart == "Alle Arten") |> 
  mutate(Bestand = "bas") |>
  select(c(Bestand, Periode, Baumart, GWertL)) |>
```
